Name: English
Splashes: Are you talking to this world with your hands? Yes?
Now the world is asynchronous, Jevil are you happy?!
The players are covered! Are you a player?
Who invented the Underverse? I'm serious. I don't remember
Do you want to become a BIG SHOT?
It's not leak Deltarune chapter 7... and 6... and 5... and... I'm too lazy to write further
I don't like Fatal Errors - Danil
Mhhh, I have to rewrite everything again

MobileControls.Description: Here you can set a position and size of controlers. Click on the controler to change

InkSans.Name: Ink Sans
InkSans.Bio: Guardian of the Multiverse, deemed an outcode character. He endorses other creators to keep developing their AUs. Ink doesn't have an AU of his own, so he's given to travel across different universes, as well as attend to the Doodle Sphere - the 'intersection' between all the existing AUs. Ink is soulless, thus locking himself from feeling things on his own. That's where his paint flasks come in handy, endowing him with emotions when consumed over time. Thanks to that, he commonly appears as a cheerful and playful being, always ready to help. Ink wields a brush as a primary weapon, which he calls Broomie. He's able to form different attacks by using his ink.

PassiveSkill.Name: Soulless heart
PassiveSkill.Description: Ink Sans is not affected by gravity from blue attack and orange attack

Attack2.Name: Ink Gasterblasters
Attack2.Description: Gasterblasters knocking back the soul to the box border and dealing damage

SpecialAttack.Name: Ink blast
SpecialAttack.Description: Droplets of ink fly out of the center of the arena while you are attacked by Ink gasterblasters and Broomie

ErrorSans.Name: Error Sans
ErrorSans.Bio: Exterminator of Alternate Universes, ruins others' lives for his amusement, including taking human souls and other characters to the Anti-Void. Error can shift between the Universes via glitched portals. Error's origin is unknown; even Error himself has no clue how he ended up in the Anti-Void. Error is a selfish introvert, confirmed to be haphephobic, which means being afraid of others' touches, in addition to being myopic.

PassiveSkill.Name: Glitches
PassiveSkill.Description: Error Sans has a 10% chance to take no damage when Karmic damage occurs

Attack0.Name: Error bones
Attack0.Description: Bones targeting the soul and dealing damage on impact

Attack1.Name: Strings
Attack1.Description: Strings targeting the soul. Damage and paralyze opponent on impact

SpecialAttack.Name: Panic attack
SpecialAttack.Description: A strong volley of dice followed by multiple shots from the gasterblasters

ClassicSans.Name: Sans
ClassicSans.Bio: The origin of all the other Sanses. Sans lived with other monsters in the Underground sealed by The Barrier until a human named Frisk helped them all escape to The Surface one day. Thenceforth Sans lives there along with humans and monsters. This skeleton is best described as a humorous jester. He's fond of dad jokes and loves drinking ketchup, cuz, why not. However, Sans is often lazy and procrastinating, and sleeping is his jam.

PassiveSkill.Name: Rest
PassiveSkill.Description: If Sans misses a turn, then he recovers 10 magic

Attack0.Name: Bones
Attack0.Description: Bones targeting the soul and dealing damage on impact

Attack2.Name: Blue attack
Attack2.Description: The soul turns blue, gravitation flips and bones emerge from the attracting side of the box

SpecialAttack.Name: Bad time
SpecialAttack.Description: Alternating attacks: blue attack, bones, blue attack, and then a strong barrage of Gasterblasters

FellSans.Name: Fell Sans
FellSans.Bio: Sans's edgy version, belonging to Underfell AU and living in the Underground, where all monsters are more aggressive version of their original counterparts. This skeleton is pretty similar to the original Sans except for the appearance, rough temper and passion towards mustard.

PassiveSkill.Name: Energy potential
PassiveSkill.Description: Fell Sans gets 1 additional magic for bringing soul closer to attacks

Attack0.Name: Bones
Attack0.Description: Bones targeting the soul and dealing damage on impact

Attack2.Name: Blue attack
Attack2.Description: The soul turns blue, gravitation flips and bones emerge from the attracting side of the box

SpecialAttack.Name: Great time
SpecialAttack.Description: Alternating attacks: bones, blue attack, bones, and then a strong barrage of Gasterblasters

SwapSans.Name: Swap Sans
SwapSans.Bio: Sans that belongs to Underswap AU, where everybody's personality is swapped with one of another related character. So the Sans has the personality of Papyrus from original universe hence being cheerful, beaming and energetic. Wishes to join the Royal Guard and has a personally handmade Battle Body, which he never takes off even while showering. Ink Sans calls him Blueberry, or Blue for short. Ink met him in his house after Blue had accidentally spilled color paints. Swap Sans loves Mexican food, especially taco. Cooks for himself.

PassiveSkill.Name: Damage resistance
PassiveSkill.Description: Swap Sans only takes up to 10 damage from each hit

Attack0.Name: Bones
Attack0.Description: Bones targeting the soul and dealing damage on impact

Attack1.Name: Spinning bones
Attack1.Description: Spinning bones targeting the soul and dealing damage on impact

SpecialAttack.Name: Bone barrage
SpecialAttack.Description: Full-wide bones moving in and out, in addition to smaller bones aiming the soul

SwapPapyrus.Name: Swap Papyrus
SwapPapyrus.Bio: SwapSans's big brother. Belongs to UnderSwap AU. His personality is similar to the OG Sans's, he's joking, yet lazy. He wears an orange hoodie, black shorts and also red sneakers, for some reason. Tends to stoop a lot not to embarrass his brother by his height, also keeps a сigarette in his mouth all the time. Papyrus sincerely loves his brother and is always ready to support and protect him by all means.

PassiveSkill.Name: Smoke break
PassiveSkill.Description: If Swap Papyrus misses a turn, then he recovers 10 magic

Attack0.Name: Bones
Attack0.Description: Bones targeting the soul and dealing damage on impact

Attack2.Name: Orange attack
Attack2.Description: The soul turns orange and gravitate to one side of the box with bones

SpecialAttack.Name: Bad time
SpecialAttack.Description: Alternating attacks: orange attack, bones, orange attack, and then a strong barrage of Gasterblasters

Cross.Name: Cross
Cross.Bio: An alternate version of Sans from the XTale universe that was destroyed through his fault. He believed that by killing his family and friends, he would be able to get the Overwrite power and create the world anew. Instead, he was left alone along with X Chara's spirit, who was able to take control of Cross's body when Error stole their soul. He got the name Cross by X Frisk because he looked like a big cross with legs. Cross is no longer upbeat and playful. He is mostly sullen or aggressive. His favorite foods are tacos and chocolate. Afraid of cows.

PassiveSkill.Name: Cross of destiny
PassiveSkill.Description: Cross's Special Attack accumulates by 10% per turn

Attack0.Name: Bones
Attack0.Description: Bones targeting the soul and dealing damage on impact

Attack2.Name: Blue attack
Attack2.Description: The soul turns blue, gravitation flips and bones emerge from the attracting side of the box

SpecialAttack.Name: The Crusader
SpecialAttack.Description: Rotating bones appear in the center of the box, gasterblasters and small bones shoot towards the soul

CrossXEvent.Name: Cross
CrossXEvent.Bio: An alternate version of Sans from the XTale universe that was destroyed through his fault. He believed that by killing his family and friends, he would be able to get the Overwrite power and create the world anew. Instead, he was left alone along with X Chara's spirit, who was able to take control of Cross's body when Error stole their soul. He got the name Cross by X Frisk because he looked like a big cross with legs. Cross is no longer upbeat and playful. He is mostly sullen or aggressive. His favorite foods are tacos and chocolate. Afraid of cows.

PassiveSkill.Name: Cross of destiny
PassiveSkill.Description: Cross's Special Attack accumulates by 10% per turn

Attack0.Name: Bones
Attack0.Description: Bones targeting the soul and dealing damage on impact

Attack1.Name: Big knife
Attack1.Description: A big knife that swings and does damage

SpecialAttack.Name: The Crusader
SpecialAttack.Description: Rotating bones appear in the center of the box, gasterblasters and small bones shoot towards the soul

XtaleChara.Name: X Chara
XtaleChara.Bio: A child from the XTale Universe who managed to survive in a monster body after genocide and destruction of his Universe. Due to his soul having been taken by Error Sans, he had to seek a replacement to it, so in searches, he made his way to the Original Universe as the only place he could reach. X!Chara is strong-willed and confident, although with occasional rage breakdowns. He loves chocolate.

PassiveSkill.Name: Magic burst
PassiveSkill.Description: When under 20 HP, dodging an attack grants XChara +10 Magic and +10% special attack charge

Attack2.Name: Psychological attack
Attack2.Description: Circular zones appear that deal damage and make the soul tremble

SpecialAttack.Name: Healing magic
SpecialAttack.Description: Restores HP depending on the amount of magic

Green.Name: Green
Green.Bio: Outcode and non-multiverse editor that roams the worlds in search of inspiration. He is the creation of Error 404. He was created to eliminate buggy anomalies by having the ability to edit code. He independently created the most secure timeline that thrives to this day. Due to one incident during creation, his soul was twisted into a non-standard form, and Green himself gained a one-of-a-kind editing power, which he developed over time. He knows perfectly well what is in the game and sees all the players that control the characters. Unlike the others, he is not her prisoner, because he himself often comes here to challenge the players.

PassiveSkill.Name: Variable damage
PassiveSkill.Description: Green either deals 1 karmic damage or 5 non-karmic damage, determined on hit randomly

Attack0.Name: Bones and spikes
Attack0.Description: Bones and spikes targeting the soul and dealing damage on impact

Attack1.Name: Strings
Attack1.Description: Strings targeting the soul. Damage and paralyze opponent on impact

Attack2.Name: Turbo blaster
Attack2.Description: One moving turbo blaster that shoots toward the soul

SpecialAttack.Name: Edit
SpecialAttack.Description: An attack which the attacking objects change by pressing a button

Dream.Name: Dream
Dream.Bio: Dream was born out of light by Nim, The Guardian of The Tree of Feelings, to guard The Tree after her death. Dream embodies an essense of positive energy in a skeleton shell of Swap!Sans. Once his brother, Nightmare, accidently plagued The Tree's fruits with negative energy, Dream had to seal the last remaining fruit inside himself, thus making it his soul. Dream is very kind, polite, and always ready to help those who's in need. He's Ink's friend and partner in protecting the Multiverse.

PassiveSkill.Name: Good spirits
PassiveSkill.Description: Each time Dream is undamaged in a turn, he gets +10% Special Attack charge

Attack0.Name: Star staff
Attack0.Description: Attack with stars, that fly towards the enemy and deal damage

Attack1.Name: Daggers
Attack1.Description: Two daggers swinging and dealing damage

Attack2.Name: Dream's bow
Attack2.Description: Arrows that aim the enemy and may ricochet

SpecialAttack.Name: Positive commitment
SpecialAttack.Description: Arrows that break on impact with arena into stars flying in all directions

Nightmare.Name: Nightmare
Nightmare.Bio: Nightmare was born out of dark by The Guardian of The Tree of Feelings to protect the negative half of The Tree. In his world of Dreamtale Nightmare was believed to be the harbinger of calamities and bullied for it by humans and monsters. In his attempts to prove them wrong, that he's still capable of good actions, Nightmare grabbed a golden apple, thus turning it in total black, as well as all the other fruits on The Tree. Negative feelings then flooded all over the people of Dreamtale. Appaled, Nightmare started eating the dark fruits, turning himself into essense of the dark matter. Nightmare is a cunning and violent evil. He's able to manipulate beings using his negative emotional control. You shouldn't deal with him.

PassiveSkill.Name: Negative commitment
PassiveSkill.Description: Taking damage grants Nightmare the same amount of special attack charge

Attack0.Name: Tenticles
Attack0.Description: Tenticles that move across arena and deal damage

Attack1.Name: Negativity spikes
Attack1.Description: Spikes emerging from arena's borders and dealing damage

Attack2.Name: Slime
Attack2.Description: Dark substance that takes various forms to attack soul

SpecialAttack.Name: Rage
SpecialAttack.Description: Nightmare grows huge, pursuing soul and reaching it with slimy hands. Also a ravine of bones spawns on arena

Papyrus.Name: Papyrus
Papyrus.Bio: Sans's little brother from Undertale universe. Wants to be cool and popular, and he's putting his entire backbone into it. Loves cooking, especially with Undyne. Has got his own red car. Papyrus is an open-minded monster, albeit a bit of a dork, but he's always ready to stand up for his friends and family. He believes that there is always something good in every human and monster.

PassiveSkill.Name: Damage resistance
PassiveSkill.Description: Papyrus only takes up to 10 damage from each hit

Attack0.Name: Bones
Attack0.Description: Bones aiming soul and dealing damage

Attack1.Name: Bones and blue bones
Attack1.Description: Attack with common bones и blue bones, that damage soul only when it's moving

SpecialAttack.Name: Cool Dude
SpecialAttack.Description: Huge amount of complex bone attacks with a wide leap over bones at the end

XAnastasia.Name: XAnastasia
XAnastasia.Bio: She was XGaster's own test creation, but didn't satisfy him, and thus was left in his data compilation.

PassiveSkill.Name: Manueverability
PassiveSkill.Description: XAnastasia's soul moves faster and jumps higher when in blue mode.

Attack0.Name: Feathers
Attack0.Description: Sharpened feathers that aim for soul

Attack1.Name: Swords
Attack1.Description: Attack using swords that deal damage

Attack2.Name: Scythe
Attack2.Description: A scythe that swing and deal damage

SpecialAttack.Name: Fleet-winged
SpecialAttack.Description: Soul leaps upwards, getting attacked by feathers, swords and scythe

Jevil.Name: Jevil
Jevil.Bio: Dark being from Deltarune universe. Jevil is interested in spreading chaos to the maximum extent. Before going insane, he was The King of Spades' court jester. But after meeting a strange man, his views were changed. He started treating life as a game, and all around as being caged in it. Jevil is a crazed evil not to be dealt with.

PassiveSkill.Name: Power of CHAOS
PassiveSkill.Description: When under 40 HP, Jevil get a random (up to 8) amount of Magic after each turn

Attack0.Name: Bombs of CHAOS
Attack0.Description: Bombs that scatter card suits on exploding

Attack1.Name: Suits
Attack1.Description: Card suits flying and dealing damage

Attack2.Name: Scythe of CHAOS
Attack2.Description: Scythe of Chaos that spins and deals damage

SpecialAttack.Name: Three-staged CHAOS
SpecialAttack.Description: A three-staged attack. First stage — carousel, second — scythes and card suits, third — scythes and bombs

Tornado.Name: Tornado
Tornado.Bio: Danil didn't make a description of the character, because he has no time. He's making a game, get away from the boy!

PassiveSkill.Name: Fast fins
PassiveSkill.Description: Tornado is able to dodge any damage, but every 1 damage spent 3 stamina

Battle.DisconnectedFromTheBattle: The player was disconnected from the battle!

Dialog1: {C:secretive}You will not need for this information soon.
Dialog2: {C:satisfied}Never let your guard down. You should listen to Undyne when she gives you advice.
{C:satisfied}That was much easier than being nice to you. Thank you, Sans.
Dialog3: {Ink:combat}You will never find happiness in someone else's universe, C.
{C:angry}You again! Get lost! Or I'm gonna destroy his soul! No more of your pacifist crap!
{Ink:combat}Stop fooling around, Chara. Give him his soul back and then we can go home, ok?
{Ink:normal}Sans, stay behind me. I'll try to make this quick.
Dialog4: {Ink:normal}Now I will teach you, how to fight in this game.
{Ink:normal}Red bar is HP, white one is stamina, cyan one is magic.
{Ink:surprised}Oh, no. Chara is attacking first. Dodge his attacks using a soul!
Dialog5: {Ink:confused}Bro, you need to train. You lost too many HP.
{Ink:normal}I have three attacks: Inks, Broomie and Ink Gasterblasters.
Dialog6: {Ink:normal}Every time you choose an attack, your stamina is lost.
{Ink:normal}You can try to predict the enemy's attack so we don't lose HP and restore our stamina.
Dialog7: {Ink:normal}Now you know, how stamina is working.
{Ink:normal}If your stamina is low you won't be able to attack, so save it.
{Ink:normal}Now I will tell you about magic.
{Ink:normal}It allows you to strengthen your attack.
{Ink:normal}The stronger the attack, the more likely it is to do serious damage.
{Ink:normal}This indicator shows how strong your attack is.
{Ink:normal}Try to select any attack and power up it.
WrongAttack: {Ink:confused}Emm... you chose the wrong attack. Choose Inks.
WrongPower: {Ink:confused}You forgot to power up our attack. Press right.
WrongSkip: {Ink:confused}No need to choose an attack. Press [X].
Dialog8: {Ink:normal}Magic is restored when you hit an enemy or get close to attack.
{Ink:normal}When your soul is close to taking damage, it lights up. Do you see?
{Ink:normal}Now Chara attacks. Try to predict the attack again.
Dialog9: {Ink:surprised}Oops, it looks like Chara has decided to attack you with another attack!
Dialog10: {Ink:normal}By the way, you don't have to attack. You can press [X] to skip your turn.
{Ink:normal}This is useful when your stamina is low.
Dialog11: {Ink:normal}One more point. The enemy won't wait long for your turn.
{Ink:normal}Each player has 10 seconds to choose an attack.
{Ink:normal}If time ran out and you don't choose an attack, then you will miss a turn.
Dialog12: {Sans:tired}look, bud. i dunno what's happening but you don't belong here.
{Sans:tired}i'm sure this artist me will help ya.
{Ink:calm}Chara, Cross, let's go home. We'll find a better way to...
{C:secretive}I just don't want to die... I just... I need...

Dialog2: {Ink:calm}I-I'm so sorry, Sans, I never thought this could happen...
{Sans:tired}it's ok bud. i'm not dead... at least not yet.
{Sans:tired}looks like that guy likes to cause trouble.
{Ink:calm}Actually, this is the first time he's done something like this.
{Ink:calm}He's scared since... Well... It's a long story.
Choise1: The artist version of Sans wants to talk with someone.
Dialog3_Line1: {Sans:tired}umm... my bro and the others will arrive in 20 minutes, so i guess we can talk for a ►
Dialog4_Line1: {Ink:enthusiastic}DO YOU WANNA KNOW MORE ABOUT C!? GREAT!!
{Ink:normal}Alright... All started with a simple drop in a far universe...
Dialog5_Line1: {Ink:none}Everything seemed to be normal. Your universe and the thousands of existing variations still continued peacefully.
{Ink:none}Suddenly, I felt the appearance of a new universe. It had a very strong presense...
{Ink:none}...despite havng the sound of dripping water.
{Ink:none}I cound't contain my excitement, so I decided to go there.
Dialog6_Line1: {Ink:none}I was eager to meet this new world and its inhabitants...
{Ink:none}...But there was absolutely nothing except for one person.
{Ink:none}He was very scared. His mind was invaded by horror.
{Ink:none}He noticed there was someone else... me.
{Ink:none}However, soon we broke the ice, and he told me his name.
Dialog7_Line1: {Ink:none}He called himself Cross, the only survivor of a Genocide Run without RESET possibilities.
Dialog8_Line1: {Sans:confused}wait a sec... if he was in a Genocide timeline, where's the human that caused it?
{Ink:calm}Chara is sealed inside his body. How did it happen? He never told me...
{Ink:calm}At first they acted as two separate beings.
{Ink:calm}However, as I visited Cross to keep him company, he won full control of both souls.
Dialog9_Line1: {Ink:none}One day, while we were drawing stuff, he stood up.
{Ink:none}He looked pretty down in the dumps.
Dialog10_Line1: {Ink:none}He told me that a strange child appeared in his world, and tried to convince him to go to a place with other survivors like him.
Dialog11_Line1: {Ink:calm}He refused to go, because he was convinced that his world was still alive.
{Ink:calm}Cross thought he could restore everything with my help.
{Ink:calm}But when I told him that I can't resurrect the dead...
Dialog3_Line2: {Sans:tired}y'know, you should probably go. i'm not into your shenanigans.
{Ink:surprised}But, Sans... A half of your soul was taken.
{Sans:tired}i can live with that. and you better clean your mess yourself.
{Ink:calm}Alright, I get it. All of this was my fault after all.
{Ink:combat}Don't worry, Sans. I'll get you your half of soul, whatever it takes.
Dialog14: {Ink:calm}Cross, please! You know I can't create worlds anew. Are you ok?
Dialog15: {Ink:combat}Fine... I'll leave you, Cross... just don't be sad... because...
{Ink:combat}You're like a brother to me... and I don't want my brother to be sad.
Dialog17: {Error:normal}HUMM... THIS PLACE IS PRETTY BIG FOR A SINGLE PERSON.
Dialog18: {Error:normal}Ink...Ink... Why do you insist on protecting this anomaly?
{Error:normal}You know you can't help them anymore.
{Error:normal}Let me give him a happy ending this time.
Dialog19: {Error:normal}Don't be so stubborn, Ink. It's all over for him.
{Ink:angry}I won't let you do whatever you want!
TakeDamage: {Error:angry}Hey you, player! Stop catching ink with that heart of yours!
{Error:angry}Hold [Shift] to slow down if you're bad at dodging.
TakeDamageMobile: {Error:angry}Hey you, player! Stop catching ink with that heart of yours!
{Error:angry}Hold active ability key to slow down if you're bad at dodging.
DontTakeDamage: {Error:normal}If you ever need to slow down, just hold [Shift].
DontTakeDamageMobile: {Error:normal}If you ever need to slow down, just hold active ability key.
Dialog20: {Error:normal}Hell, Ink is good at dodging my attacks.
Dialog23: {Ink:calm}Someone capable of manipulating a monster's body with that twisted mind... It could be really difficult trying to stop them.
{Ink:calm}I have to admit that I can't stop them by myself...
{Ink:calm}I know this isn't the right thing to do, but... Sans...
{Ink:calm}I need your help to find Cross... Would you like to come with me?
Choise2: Ink asks you to join them for an adventure to find Cross
Dialog24_Line1: {Sans:confused}woah, wait a sec, artist... right now?
{Sans:normal}my friends are picnicking right now, i can't just abandon them. papyrus won't ever get off my backbone if i don't show up.
Dialog24_Line2: {Sans:normal}...heh. sorry bud, but no. actually, i think i can live with this.
{Ink:glad}Oh... That's ok! I get it. I was the one who let this happen...
{Ink:glad}So, I'll do my best to fix this and bring back your soul.
Dialog25_Line2: {Ink:normal}Have a nice day with all your friends!
Dialog27: {PapyrusPicnic:normal}THERE YOU ARE, BROTHER! ARE YOU READY FOR OUR MAGNIFICENT PICNIC?

Dialog1: {XChara:glad}WE DID IT! HAHAHA! This is half of the original Sans' soul!
{XChara:glad}Now I have a better idea... Let's make our OWN UNIVERSE!
{XChara:glad}We don't need to live in a used, boring timeline...
{XChara:glad}We can make this more interesting... but first, let's absorb this soul. Are you ready?
Dialog4: {CrossXEvent:tired}Ink was trying to help us... Sans refused to fight... Why do we have to do this?
Dialog7: {XChara:none}I made you a promise, "Sans". I promised to be your friend... Those dark days are over.
{XChara:none}You gave up long time ago, but not me.
{XChara:none}I'll help you to rebuild the world we lost.
Dialog9: {XCharaSpirit:normal}You do remember what Ink used to tell you, right?
{XCharaSpirit:normal}While you were spending all your time talking to your buddy Ink, I decided to analize these Alternate Universes.
{XCharaSpirit:normal}There are a lot of worlds that we can "visit"... but I'm only interested in a few of them.
{CrossXEvent:normal}Heh. You're a very clever guy despite being just a dying piece of determination.
{CrossXEvent:normal}Now tell me, how are we going to get to the next world if we don't know any routes?
Dialog11: {CrossXEvent:none}I DON'T WANT TO STAY DOING NOTHING!!
{CrossXEvent:none}I WANT MY WORLD BACK! I WANT TO LIVE IN PEACE LIKE THEM!!!
Dialog12: {Nightmare:normal}Seems like you're not happy for some reason. I can feel it.
Dialog13: {CrossXEvent:normal}...Do you have anything to do with Ink or Error?
{Nightmare:normal}How rude! I'm offering my help and you attack me with your stupid questions.
{Nightmare:normal}No. I have nothing to do with them. I found you thanks to your negative feelings.
{CrossXEvent:normal}Can you move through positive feelings too?
{Nightmare:normal}Ha! Why would I do it? Beings who are happy are fine on their own! Beings like YOU are the ones who need my help.
Dialog14: {CrossXEvent:normal}Pacifist worlds don't deserve to be happy either...
{Nightmare:glad}Ah, I like your intentions... Well, I guess I can give you the ability to access any AU you want... But I want one thing in exchange.
{Nightmare:glad}Wherever you go, I want you to hurt somebody, but not physically. You know what I'm talking about.
Dialog17: {UndynePicnic:glad}Dang, it's been a while since we last gathered like that!
{PapyrusPicnic:glad}THAT'S RIGHT! AND IN SUCH A BIG GROUP!
{UndynePicnic:glad}Asgore, wrap up cooking those royal steaks, would ya?
{UndynePicnic:glad}Our ambassador must be starving their guts out!
Dialog19: {TorielPicnic:glad}What a beautiful day! Everybody is having fun. What do you think, Sans?
{Sans:normal}well, staying at home would be a...
Dialog20: {UndynePicnic:normal}Hey, Papyrus, go get us some more ketchup.
{PapyrusPicnic:shocked}WHAT? I DON'T EVEN KNOW WHERE IT'S SOLD!
{Sans:normal}yeah, about that. you shouldn't send him shopping all alone.
{Sans:joking}he once ended up looking for clothes in a soup store.
{PapyrusPicnic:angry}I ACTUALLY MENT TO BUY THE SOUP! I JUST DIDN'T WANT TO TELL YOU!
{PapyrusPicnic:angry}NO YOU WON'T! WE'RE NOT IN FOR ANOTHER SEARCH IF YOU FALL ASLEEP SOMEWHERE ON YOUR WAY AGAIN.
{UndynePicnic:normal}Then why not send Frisk with him? Our ambassador would keep him up for sure.
{UndynePicnic:normal}Frisk, could you and Sans go get some ketchup from the store?
Asgore: {AsgorePicnic:normal} Don't worry, Frisk. You will get your steak. I'll make sure of it.
Bear_1: Ah, nothing beats the kick from moving to the warm woods after the cold ones.
I just feel like I've found my niche in this world.
Rabbit_1: It's our first time at this park and we're a bit excited.
The nature is just so... exquisite.
Even touching the trees is scary, as the precious bark might break.
DogsFamily_1: This smell rings a bell. I bet I know it.
Oh, you're THAT one human. Nice to meet you again.
I'm just glad we took a day of our honeymoon for a park stroll.
DogSmaller_1: {Sans:joking}looks like it's glad to see you.
RoyalGuard1_1: Let Asgore know we've cleaned the park. Every inch of it.
RoyalGuard1_2: I believe we nailed this job.
RoyalGuard2_1: It sure is hot today, isn't it?
Jerry_1: {NPC:none}I haven't seen those pink blots before.
Jerry_2: Did you find the blot maker yet?
FicusLicker_1: I was near the ficus at the hotel.
I'm searching for my bros over here. Mind lending a hand?
We've been playing hide-and-seek, but I still can't find them anywhere.
You know, help me, and I'll reward you. Sounds fair?
FicusLicker_Found_0: {NPC:none}They sure must be somewhere around. At least one should be in the park.
FicusLicker_Found_1: {NPC:none}Nice! But that's not enough. There were three of them. Keep at it.
FicusLicker_Found_3: {NPC:none}Awesome! Thanks for your help! Here's your share - 15G.
MushroomLicker_1: Move or you'll get me seen. I'm hide-and-seeking.
Inks_1: {Chara:none}It's weird to see a paint puddle in the park.
Doggo_1: Hey, human child, no petting today.
NiceCreamSeller_1: Oh, hey. It's been a while... Ever since the underground.
My business on the surface is doing pretty well.
I realized that selling nicecream at hot places works the best.
NiceCreamSeller_Choise: Do you want to buy a nicecream for 12G?
NiceCreamSeller_2: Thanks for purchase! I'll see you later!
NiceCreamSeller_3: Sorry, but you're out of cash. Maybe you can find some first?
NiceCreamSeller_4: Well, that's ok. See you later!
NiceCreamSeller_5: So you do want to buy a nicecream?
Vulkin: Don't bother me. I'm warming up.
Napstablook_1: Hi. Glad to see you again.
I'm looking for some fine places on the surface to lay down and feel like trash.
I've learned that humans sort the trash to recycle it into new materials.
You know, that actually brought some depth to my meditations.
Feeling like trash, imagining you'll be turned into something useful someday... It is inspiring.
Napstablook_2: {Sans:normal}actually, we were heading to the ketchup store.
{NPC:none}Oh... sorry. Then I won't keep you any longer.
Napstablook_3: You need to get the ketchup. Please go.
DJ_1: {NPC:none}Yo, what's up, human. Do you know me?
{NPC:none}How about you come around for my performance tommorow?
{NPC:none}Shucks, that's a pity. Well, check the announcements from time to time. You might get to see my best someday.
Harper_1: I'm not even surprised Mettaton isn't here yet.
He arrives two more minutes late every time.
His watch must have got an extra second.
Turtle: Working at weekends... That is straight up horrible.
Vert_1: I'm watching world's most interesting video.
MintLicker_1: I'd like my bro to find me, so I stopped hiding.
But I know he's not coming after me.
PapyrusCar: {Chara:none}Papyrus' car that got us all here.
Schoolchild_1: {NPC:none}Oh, you're back from school already? You must have morning classes, right?
{NPC:none}Oops... I guess I forgot about it.
Schoolchild_2: I'm going home now, I guess.
Sportsman_2: Good luck... kid and... not kid.
LivingStone_1: This stone seems to be deliberately preventing you from passing.
Muffin: Beautiful muffins with purple frosting are on display.
KetchupShop_1: {NPC:none}Welcome to the ketchup store! Can I help you gentlemen?
KetchupShop_3_Line2: {Sans:normal}hey, kid, you're sure you got money for it?
KetchupShop_4: {NPC:none}Ho, no problem. Here, I'll show you my selection.
KetchupShop_5: {Sans:normal}hey, kid, could you get me that limited edition one for 20G?
{Sans:joking}don't worry, i'll pay you back. you know i don't stay in debt.
KetchupShop_6: {Sans:normal}thanks. lend me the bottle later, ok?
Ketchup: Limited edition bottles of ketchup and mustard are on the shelf.
FriskDrankKetchup: {Sans:normal}you caught me off guard with that one, kid.
{Sans:joking}you just SQUEEZED it all out of this prank.
Dialog22_Line1: {UndynePicnic:normal}Great! You got the ketchup! I didn't even have to save y'all.
{TorielPicnic:normal}Frisk, take a seat. Your steak is ready.
Dialog22_Line2: {TorielPicnic:normal}Frisk, take a seat. Your steak is ready.
Dialog25: {UndynePicnic:glad}You wanna bet my team is getting this score?
{PapyrusPicnic:normal}HAH! UNDYNE, YOU'RE TOO CONFIDENT, AREN'T YOU?
{UndynePicnic:normal}Should you know, we've been training everyday to defeat you, punks!
Dialog28: {SansVolleybro:tired}maybe i need a break, can i, bro?
{PapyrusPicnic:worry}OF COURSE, BROTHER. BUT DON'T FALL ASLEEP!
{PapyrusPicnic:worry}WE NEED YOU TO WIN THIS GAME.
Papyrus_2: {PapyrusPicnic:worry}I'M WORRIED ABOUT SANS. I'VE NEVER SEEN HIM LOOK SO DOWN.
{PapyrusPicnic:worry}COULD YOU PLEASE GO CHECK ON HIM?
Undyne_2: {UndynePicnic:worry}It couldn't have been my hit that actually broke him.
Asgore_2: {AsgorePicnic:worry}I noticed Sans has been acting quite odd today, if that's what you want to know.
{AsgorePicnic:worry}This skeleton has always gleemed with positivity every time I met him.
{AsgorePicnic:worry}But now... Papyrus might be worried for a reason.
Asgore_3: {AsgorePicnic:worry}I think you should see your friend.
Alphys_2: {AlphysPicnic:worry}I can feel it. In this mood he's just not himself.
Toriel_2: {TorielPicnic:worry}Poor Sans. He must have got hit very hard.
{TorielPicnic:worry}I just don't get it why he would leave. Why not lay down and have some rest to recover?
NiceCreamSeller_7: Oh, sorry, I blocked your way.
I'll try to lift it again. It's pretty heavy.
NiceCreamSeller_8: I'll put the cart away soon.
Dialog32_Line2: {Sans:tired}as weird as it may sound... but i need help.
Dialog34: {Sans:normal}i can tell you a very bad pun to explain this...
{Sans:normal}but... uh... that's not necessary... nothin' important, kiddo.
Dialog35: {Frisk:normal}I can see, that you're not alright
{Sans:angry}kid, i'm fine, ok? it just was an incident with Cr ►
Dialog36: {Sans:normal}there you are, ink. i've decided to go with you
Dialog37: {Frisk:normal}Ink...? Why does Sans have to leave...?
{Sans:joking}...i guess i have to tell you everything, huh.
{Sans:normal}well, someone may not care to listen since they saw everything.
Dialog39: {Frisk:normal}Sans, I have to go with you.
{Sans:normal}sorry, kid. you gotta cover for me while i'm gone.
{Sans:normal}if i stopped being lazy after all this time.
{Sans:normal}you can help me that way, ok?
{Sans:normal}heh. you know i hate to make promises but... i'll try.
Dialog44: {Sans:glad}...'cause someone really cares about you... yeah...

NiceCream.Name: Nice Cream
NiceCream.Description: Being nice breaks the ice. Heals 12 HP.

Ketchup.Name: Ketchup
Ketchup.Description: A standart bottle of ketchup. Heals 10 HP.

Mustard.Name: Mustard
Mustard.Description: A standart bottle of spicy mustard. Heals 10 HP.

CheeseSauce.Name: Cheese Sauce
CheeseSauce.Description: Good sauce for many meals. Heals 10 HP.

KetchupLimited.Name: Limited Ketchup
KetchupLimited.Description: Deluxe Limited Edition Ketchup. Heals 12 HP.

Greeting: Oh, hello, darling! Welcome to my bakery! We're holding special discounts this time, just like humans do.
Sell: Oh, darling, I really need nothing... if it's not money.
I'd be glad to let you buy something tasty and support our bakery. Hu-hu.
Talk: Wish to talk about something, dear?
Gratitude: Thank you! Spiders won't forget your kindness.
AboutBakery: Oh, are you interested in our bakery, really?
I had a quite successfull business in the underground.
So I had enough money to buy this little modest shop.
But we're not hungry for space. My dearies are working their pastries in the other room right now.
Some people are afraid of spiders, so we have to keep them away.
Or else they might just get... well... squashed.
I just hate such people. If it were for me, I would tie them all up and send to feed my pet. Hu-hu-hu!
AboutMuffin: That's right. Oh, that is my sheer pride.
I've achieved such a flavourous mix even a human would not withstand.
Now that's our most common order. Clients are delighted with such pastry.
You should try it too. Don't be shy and buy, darling.
AboutPet: I try not to let it go near humans, they're just such appetizers for it. Hu-hu.

Sell: Ho-ho! Mi dispiace, I don't need anything right now.
I'm only gaining from my business.

TalkButton.AboutMonsters: What do you make of monsters?

AboutName: My name's Dino! Pleasure to be meeting you!
AboutShop: Ho, younglin', I'm not asked about this often.
Well, as you did, now listen.
This shop is my legacy. My ancestors used to cook the best of their signature sauces here.
Our ketchup is the best in town, and we're often a site for customers.
Everything's made in-house. Today I'm attending the counter, my brother is in the kitchen, and everyday we exchange our duties.
Now, I hope you're left without a doubt we're the place to get your ketchup from.
AboutMonsters: Well, they're pretty much... interestingly looking.
Monsters are also my visitors, but more rare than humans.
In fact, I think they're good. The thing is I've been noticing more spider on the streets.
And I'm absolutely certain who brought so much of them here.
